Text: Request: @RaSe_77 "Flags of Our Fathers (2006) " in ipod format ............

Sorry guys, but I'm retracting my comment on my previous torrent of Nikita. This will be the final upload from me for this series. Apologies, but I do not have the bandwidth to seed this indefinitely. As it stands, my share ratio is over triple the amount on these episodes alone than my others. 

@dicknova: I have Flags of Our Fathers already, just let me convert for you. Should be ready tomorrow. Will look for the other 1 too.
Dicknova, sorry for the delay, had a few issues uoploading...I haven't forgotten about your requests, just need to catch up with my uploads.
